<style>
.ann {
  position: relative;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: .7rem;
  max-width: 860px;
  margin: 16px auto 8px;
  padding: .5rem .9rem;
  font: 500 .95rem/1.3 system-ui,-apple-system,"Segoe UI",Roboto,"Helvetica Neue",Arial,sans-serif;
  border-radius: 999px; 
  border: 1px solid #dbe7ff;
  background: linear-gradient(180deg,#f3f8ff 0%,#eef5ff 100%);
  box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.04);
}
.ann__dot {
  width: .55rem; height: .55rem;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background:#0d6efd;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 4px rgba(13,110,253,.12);
}
.ann__text { color:#0b2e66; }
.ann__link {
  padding:.25rem .6rem;
  border-radius:.5rem;
  border:1px solid #cfe0ff;
  text-decoration:none;
  font-weight:600;
}
.ann__link:hover {
  background:#fff;
  border-color:#b9d1ff;
  text-decoration:none;
}
.ann__close {
  margin-left:.5rem;
  border:0;
  background:transparent;
  font-size:1.1rem;
  line-height:1;
  cursor:pointer;
  color:#5c728a;
  opacity:.7;
}
.ann__close:hover { opacity:1; }
</style>

<script>
(function(){
  const KEY='ann_dismiss_v1';
  if(localStorage.getItem(KEY)==='1'){
    document.querySelector('.ann').style.display='none';
    return;
  }
  document.querySelector('.ann__close')?.addEventListener('click',e=>{
    e.currentTarget.closest('.ann').remove();
    localStorage.setItem(KEY,'1');
  });
})();
</script>
